mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER(ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, ORDER_DATE, PRODUCT_COUNT) VALUES(ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{productId}, #{orderNumber}, #{orderDate}, #{productCount})
mapper.select: SELECT TBO.ID, PRODUCT_ID ,PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, PRODUCT_COUNT, PRODUCT_COUNT * PRODUCT_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER TBO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBO.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TBP ON TBO.PRODUCT_ID = TBP.ID AND TBM.ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY TBO.ID DESC
SELECT PRODUCT_COUNT FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT TBO.ID, SELLER_ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, ORDER_DATE, PRODUCT_COUNT, SELLER_EMAIL, SELLER_PASSWORD, SELLER_NAME, SELLER_PHONE, SELLER_SMS, SELLER_EMAILCHECK, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_SMS, MEMBER_EMAILCHECK, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_TYPE,PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME,PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE1, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE2, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE3, PRODUCT_COUNT * PRODUCT_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TBL_ORDER TBO JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TBO.MEMBER_ID = TM.ID JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TBO.PRODUCT_ID = TP.ID JOIN TBL_SELLER TS ON TP.SELLER_ID = TS.ID AND TS.ID = #{sellerId} ORDER BY TBO.ID DESC
